RUN_PARAM, P1, P2, P3,

mapper.select: select d.BIANMA PARAGRAPH, d.`NAME` PARAGRAPH_NAME, d.NAME_EN PARAGRAPH_PATH from sys_dictionaries d where d.PARENT_ID in (select sd.DICTIONARIES_ID from sys_dictionaries sd where sd.BIANMA = #{paragraphCode}) order by d.ORDER_BY asc

SELECT sd.BIANMA PARAGRAPH_TYPE, d.BIANMA PARAGRAPH_CODE, d.`NAME` PARAGRAPH_NAME, d.NAME_EN PARAGRAPH_PATH FROM sys_dictionaries d, sys_dictionaries sd WHERE d.PARENT_ID = sd.DICTIONARIES_ID AND sd.BIANMA IN ('RP01','RP02','RP03','RP04','RP05') ORDER BY sd.BIANMA,d.ORDER_BY ASC

select sf.FUND_CODE, sf.FUND_ID, sf.FIRM_CODE, sf.SHORT_NAME, sf.FULL_NAME, sf.FULL_NAME_ORIGINAL, sf.TA_NAME, sf.MF, sf.ETF, sf.STRUCTURED, sf.DATE_FROM, sf.DATE_TO, sf.DATE_TRANSFORM from sys_fund_info sf where sf.`STATUS` = 'REVIEWED' and sf.active = 'Y' and sf.FUND_ID = #{FUND_ID} LIMIT 1

SELECT sm.FULL_NAME AS mgrFullName, sfs.SIGNOFF_1 as signOff1, sfs.SIGNOFF_2 as signOff2, sfs.DB_NUM as DB_NUM FROM sys_fund_info sfi LEFT JOIN sys_mgrcompany sm ON sm.COMPANY_CODE = sfi.FIRM_CODE LEFT JOIN sys_fund_signoff sfs ON sfs.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND sfi.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sm.ACTIVE = sfi.ACTIVE AND sfs.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sfi.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND sfs.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT wb.BTCODE as bsCode, IF(wb.BEGIN_BALANCE_EY = 0, null, wb.BEGIN_BALANCE_EY) as beginBalance, IF(wb.END_BALANCE_EY = 0, null, wb.END_BALANCE_EY) as endBalance FROM wp_bs wb WHERE 1 = 1 AND wb.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND wb.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT WP.BSCODE AS plCode, IF( WP.AMOUNT_CURRENT_EY = 0, NULL, WP.AMOUNT_CURRENT_EY ) AS periodAcct, IF( WP.AMOUNT_LAST_EY = 0, NULL, WP.AMOUNT_LAST_EY ) AS lastPeriodAcct FROM wp_pl WP WHERE 1 = 1 AND WP.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND WP.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT IFNULL(sfc.STOCK_ALL, 'N') AS stockAll, IFNULL(sfc.STOCK_BS, 'N') AS stockBs, IFNULL(sfc.STOCK_R, 'N') AS stockR, IFNULL(sfc.STOCK_P, 'N') AS stockP, IFNULL(sfc.STOCK_L, 'N') AS stockL, IFNULL(sfc.FUND_BS, 'N') AS fundBs, IFNULL(sfc.BOND_ALL, 'N') AS bondAll, IFNULL(sfc.BOND_BS, 'N') AS bondBs, IFNULL(sfc.BOND_R, 'N') AS bondR, IFNULL(sfc.BOND_P, 'N') AS bondP, IFNULL(sfc.ABS_ALL, 'N') AS ABSAll, IFNULL(sfc.ABS_BS, 'N') AS ABSBS, IFNULL(sfc.ABS_R, 'N') AS ABSR, IFNULL(sfc.ABS_P, 'N') AS ABSP, IFNULL(sfc.GOLD_ALL, 'N') AS goldAll, IFNULL(sfc.GOLD_BS, 'N') AS goldBs, IFNULL(sfc.GOLD_R, 'N') AS goldR, IFNULL(sfc.GOLD_P, 'N') AS goldP, IFNULL(sfc.SHORT_BOND_RATING, 'N') AS shortbondrating, IFNULL(sfc.SHORT_ABS_RATING, 'N') AS shortabsrating, IFNULL(sfc.SHORT_NCD_RATING, 'N') AS shortncdrating, IFNULL(sfc.LONG_BOND_RATING, 'N') AS longbondrating, IFNULL(sfc.LONG_ABS_RATING, 'N') AS longabsrating, IFNULL(sfc.LONG_NCD_RATING, 'N') AS longncdrating, IFNULL(sfc.EXPIRE_PERIOD_ANALYSIS, 'N') AS EXPIRE_PERIOD_ANALYSIS, IFNULL(sfc.PORTFOLIO_LIQUID_RISK, 'N') AS PORTFOLIO_LIQUID_RISK, IFNULL(sfc.RISK_S_INT, 'N') AS riskSInt, IFNULL(sfc.RISK_S_PRICE, 'N') AS riskSPrice, IFNULL(sfc.RISK_E_PRICE, 'N') AS riskEPrice, IFNULL(sfc.RISK_E_FOREIGN_EXCHANGE, 'N') AS riskEForeignExchange, IFNULL(sfc.RISK_S_FOREIGN_EXCHANGE, 'N') AS riskSForeignExchange, IFNULL(sfc.RISK_LOC, 'N') AS riskLoc FROM sys_fund_control sfc WHERE 1 = 1 AND sfc.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND sfc.FUND_ID = #{fundId} LIMIT 1

SELECT IFNULL( src.FS_ATTR1, '' ) AS FS_ATTR1, IFNULL( src.FS_ATTR2, '' ) AS FS_ATTR2, IFNULL( src.FS_ATTR3, '' ) AS FS_ATTR3, IFNULL( src.COMISSION_NOTE, '' ) AS COMISSION_NOTE, IFNULL( src.MF_ATTR1, '' ) AS MF_ATTR1, IFNULL( src.MF_ATTR2, '' ) AS MF_ATTR2, IFNULL( src.MF_ATTR3, '' ) AS MF_ATTR3, IFNULL( src.MF_ATTR4, '' ) AS MF_ATTR4, IFNULL( src.MF_ATTR5, '' ) AS MF_ATTR5, IFNULL( src.CF_ATTR1, '' ) AS CF_ATTR1, IFNULL( src.CF_ATTR2, '' ) AS CF_ATTR2, IFNULL( src.CF_ATTR3, '' ) AS CF_ATTR3, IFNULL( src.CF_ATTR4, '' ) AS CF_ATTR4, IFNULL( src.CF_ATTR5, '' ) AS CF_ATTR5, IFNULL( src.SF_ATTR1, '' ) AS SF_ATTR1, IFNULL( src.SF_ATTR2, '' ) AS SF_ATTR2, IFNULL( src.SF_ATTR3, '' ) AS SF_ATTR3, IFNULL( src.SF_ATTR4, '' ) AS SF_ATTR4, IFNULL( src.SF_ATTR5, '' ) AS SF_ATTR5, IFNULL( src.LR, '' ) AS LR, IFNULL( src.EPA, '' ) AS EPA, IFNULL( src.PLR, '' ) AS PLR, IFNULL( src.IR_ATTR1, '' ) AS IR_ATTR1, IFNULL( src.IR_UP, '' ) AS IR_UP, IFNULL( src.IR_DOWN, '' ) AS IR_DOWN, IFNULL( src.PR_UP, '' ) AS PR_UP, IFNULL( src.PR_DOWN, '' ) AS PR_DOWN, IFNULL( src.PR_ATTR1, '' ) AS PR_ATTR1, IFNULL( src.PR_ATTR2, '' ) AS PR_ATTR2, IFNULL( src.PR_ATTR3, '' ) AS PR_ATTR3, IFNULL( src.FV_ATTR1, '' ) AS FV_ATTR1, IFNULL( src.FV_ATTR2, '' ) AS FV_ATTR2, IFNULL( src.MR, '' ) AS MR, IFNULL( src.IR, '' ) AS IR, IFNULL( src.ER, '' ) AS ER, IFNULL( src.IR_EXP, '' ) AS IR_EXP, IFNULL( src.FI, '' ) AS FI, IFNULL( src.RM, '' ) AS RM, IFNULL( src.CR, '' ) AS CR, IFNULL( src.CR_LOSS, '' ) AS CR_LOSS, IFNULL( src.ADDITAN_NOTE, '' ) AS ADDITAN_NOTE, IFNULL( src.THREE_LEVEL_CHANGE_NOTE, '' ) AS THREE_LEVEL_CHANGE_NOTE
FROM sys_report_content src WHERE 1 = 1 AND src.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND src.FUND_ID = #{fundId} LIMIT 1
